name: Psyduck
author: Tomokazu Komiya
flavor_text: Overwhelmed by enigmatic abilities, it suffers a constant headache. It sometimes uses mysterious powers.

attacks.name: Headache
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent can’t play any Trainer, Supporter, or Stadium cards from his or her hand during his or her next turn.

attacks.name: Latent Power
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does no damage to the Defending Pokémon. Instead, Psyduck is now Confused.
